#sidebar TOC

= trackbacks =

List of posts referencing an url.

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*   || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| url      || string || URL string for the target. (required) ||
|| contains || string || Query string to filter results. (optional) ||

Accepts [ResListParameters List Parameters]


== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/trackbacks.json?url=http://twitter.com/
}}}

This will fetch posts in json format that reference Twitter's homepage.
